generated_body: The article titled "The Real Reason McDonald's Keeps the Filet-O-Fish on Their Menu" is likely to explore the strategic and marketing decisions behind the enduring presence of this menu item. Readers can expect an examination of factors such as consumer preferences, seasonal demand, and the impact of cultural trends on fast food offerings. The article may also delve into historical context, discussing how the Filet-O-Fish has evolved since its introduction and why it remains relevant in today’s market. Additionally, it could highlight insights from industry experts regarding menu diversification and customer loyalty.
